statements: UPDATE healthcare_recommendations SET patient_name='Alice', gender='Female' WHERE patient_id=123;
UPDATE healthcare_recommendations SET age=35, medical_history='Hypertension, Diabetes', predictive_model_output='High Risk' WHERE patient_id=456;
UPDATE healthcare_recommendations SET age = 35, gender = 'Male' WHERE patient_id = 101
UPDATE healthcare_recommendations SET predictive_model_output = 'High Risk', patient_name = 'John Doe' WHERE patient_id = 202
UPDATE Patients SET age = 35, gender = 'Male' WHERE patient_id = 1;
UPDATE Recommendations SET recommendation_text = 'Follow up in 2 weeks' WHERE patient_id = 3;
UPDATE Patients SET age=30, health_condition='Diabetes' WHERE patient_id=1001;
UPDATE Recommendations SET recommendation_text='Follow a strict diet plan' WHERE recommendation_date>'2022-01-01' AND patient_id=1001;
UPDATE Patients SET age = 30, medical_history = 'None' WHERE patient_id = 101;
UPDATE MedicalRecords SET treatment_plan = 'Physical therapy' WHERE diagnosis = 'Back pain';
UPDATE Patients SET age = 30, gender = 'Female' WHERE patient_id = 1;
